com.esri.mo2.map.draw
Interface SimpleRenderer

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, LegendInfo, Renderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseSimpleRenderer
public interface SimpleRenderer
extends Renderer

A Simple Renderer is used to draw one type of Feature (Point, Line or Polygon) using a symbol. The renderer can have different levels to be drawn with different symbols. This can be used in the case of line casing where two line symbols need to be drawn. If no levels are found then the default symbol is used.

          get the Symbol to be used
